channel.title: Combined Politepol Feed
channel.description: Merged feed from multiple Politepol sources

item.title: Will China-made submarines traverse Pakistan’s waters in 2026? Should India worry?
Could Tehran run out of drinking water in 2 weeks?
Why the US is divided over daylight saving time
Why Mehli Mistry took Tata Trusts case to Charity Commissioner instead of courts
Have Pakistan, China and Russia secretly conducted nuclear tests as Trump claims?
Will New York City elect Indian-origin Zohran Mamdani as mayor?
Cold War reversed: How Russia’s superweapons are challenging Nato
item.description: It is the psychological warfare that Russian nuclear signalling has always sought to achieve—not just military victory

item.title: Racism on streets, pluralism in rhetoric: How South Asians face hate in Canada
item.description: The challenges for South Asians facing racism in Canada involve addressing hate crimes and online bigotry while leveraging community resilience and government anti-racism strategies to foster a more inclusive society

item.title: How Apec’s evolving agenda supports India’s Indo-Pacific outlook
item.description: While India is neither a member of Apec nor was the recent summit India-centric, its outcomes offer tangible opportunities for India—if it acts proactively

item.title: India’s magic mix of domestic resilience, global adaptability fuels its economic engine
item.description: Indian economy has weathered global disruptions with relative ease, owing to its diversified structure and policy responsiveness, and that’s where it stands apart

item.title: Beneath India-China reset, structural faultlines still persist
item.description: India must position itself more carefully and strategically in a neighbourhood that is becoming increasingly volatile with political shifts—something the Chinese are adept at exploiting

item.title: Happy Halloween: India’s ‘haunted’ heritage that keeps legends alive all year
item.description: Perhaps it's the most appropriate time of the year to have a bit of fun and speak about a few heritage sites in India which have the sad reputation of being haunted by spirits
